## Business Overview
Name: Blinds and Curtains Dubai
Industry: Window coverings, blinds & curtains
Founded: (approx) 2010s
URL: https://blindsandcurtains.ae/
Description: A trusted window treatment store in Dubai offering premium blinds, curtains, shutters, and installation services with free consultations and custom solutions. Trusted by thousands of customers with excellent reviews. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

## Core Products & Services
- Motorised blinds: Custom motorised window blinds with smart control options. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
- Blackout blinds: Window blinds designed to block out sunlight. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}
- Roman blinds & roller blinds: Stylish and functional fabric blinds. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}
- Vertical blinds: Classic vertical window blinds. :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}
- Curtains: Custom curtains including sheer, blackout, and designer styles. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}
- Shutters: Window shutter solutions (if listed). :contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}
- Free in-home consultation: Experts bring samples to your home for guidance and measurements. :contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}
- Installation & after-sales care: End-to-end installation and support. :contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}
